prompts: Create a small bug-type Pokemon with bright yellow fur and big blue eyes.
Generate an adorable electric-type creature that looks fuzzy and has a cheerful expression.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that can crawl on walls and has a fluffy yellow body.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a miniature spider with vibrant colors and a friendly vibe.
Show me a Pokemon that lives in forests and has a unique fuzzy appearance with blue accents.
Make a Pokemon that has a round body and is known for its electric abilities and cuteness.
Give me an insectoid Pokemon with a playful personality and the ability to generate electricity.
